ENV.description: Setting this to ANYTHING will enable Webhooks when in env mode

API_ID.description: This is to authenticate to your Telegram account for downloading Telegram files. You can get this from https://my.telegram.org.

API_HASH.description: This is to authenticate to your Telegram account for downloading Telegram files. You can get this from https://my.telegram.org.

BOT_TOKEN.description: The telegram bot token that you get from @BotFather.

FEED_URLS.description: List of URLs of RSS Feed, sperated by | vertical bar.

LOG_CHANNEL.description: ID of the Telegram Chat where messages are to be posted.

INTERVAL.description: Set to 'True' if GDRIVE_FOLDER_ID is from a Team Drive else False or Leave it empty.

MAX_INSTANCES.description: Whether to use Service Accounts or not. For this to work see 'Using Service Accounts' in repo.
